summary: Comprehensive Kalshi prediction markets integration review completed. System is PRODUCTION READY with 5 client implementations. Identified major optimization opportunity: migrate all sync scripts from authenticated session tokens to public API (no auth required). Created detailed migration guide and implementation plan. All read operations (100% of current usage) can use public API, eliminating session token expiration issues and manual refresh overhead.

key_findings.optimization_opportunity: Migrate to public API for zero-maintenance authentication

recommendations.action: Migrate all remaining sync scripts to public API
Add integration tests for public API workflow

architecture_assessment.database_schema: EXCELLENT - Well-designed with proper indexes and views
architecture_assessment.client_layer: GOOD - Multiple options but needs consolidation
architecture_assessment.ai_integration: EXCELLENT - Multi-model ensemble with cost tracking
architecture_assessment.dashboard: EXCELLENT - Modern UI with filtering and charts
architecture_assessment.documentation: EXCELLENT - Comprehensive guides and setup instructions

technical_debt: Inconsistent client usage across sync scripts
Manual session token refresh required every 24 hours
Deprecated kalshi_client.py still in use (broken with SMS)
Duplicate code between kalshi_integration.py and kalshi_public_client.py
next_steps: Migrate first script: sync_kalshi_team_winners.py (3 line changes)
Verify sync works: python sync_kalshi_team_winners.py --sport football
Continue with remaining scripts following migration guide
